title: thread was closed in bugs ..... told to move here ..... WHEN is riot going to STOP the bots/scripts
body: Didnt play for almost 2 years bc of the problems. Now i come back and literally cant play a singe match with 5 HUMANS! about to stop AGAIN after playing for a week. Its a game and supposed to be FUN and competitive. Not so frustrating and outmatched EVERY match it makes want to stop AGAIN. So to the DEVS, WTF happened to this game! why are you letting this go on? ive been banned ( hours, days) for talking trash and now its COOL just to run a script and piss off everyone. I mean i literally just played a game where his name was "IMRUNNINGSCRIPTS" SERIOUSLY!

replies.body: didnt get the open beta yet, wanted to ease my way back into the game. but with 25% of "players" are bots and scripts i wount.

Just wait until you play ranked and people script Yasuo windwall, Xerath, Annie and Ashe. :)

Riot spends its money on MLP W40k sets and music videos, not anti-cheating detectors or superior game clients. Open beta still bugged to hell and back.

I thought this until I had someone explain what exactly it was...

You've seen the yasou script. Guaranteed. It's easy to spot once you know what to look for when they're doing it. Somehow magically, perfectly timed... the wall comes up to block your projectile? All the while the guys playing like a complete ass, throwing q's wherever he wants? mmm yeah... better than us... sure.

Lol, I have thrown some perfect walls with yasuo and i suck with him.

I have played against quite a few yasuos and none of them have perfectly thrown their wall every time it was up. Even if they were that would not be the most effective way to use it. If someone is doing that to you then use a low cooldown skill to make them wall, then abuse its really long cooldown.
